description:
Our protagonist, Sumisora Tsubasa, just got a job as a new A&R person at Gandala Music, one of the biggest record companies in the business. Almost like it was a trap, as soon as she started with the company, she was put in charge of the idol unit, "B-PROJECT." Being in charge of B-PROJECT meant that she was in charge of the three groups, "Kitakore," "THRIVE," and "MooNs." Because this is her first job, things don't go that well and she's faced with various trouble and accidents. Be ambitious along with the ten BOYS who are all very different!

(Source: Crunchyroll)

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

tags.name: Primarily Male Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

tags.name: Male Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several male characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Nekomimi
tags.description: Humanoid characters with cat-like features such as cat ears and a tail.

tags.name: Cute Boys Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around male characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Crossdressing
tags.description: Prominently features a character dressing up as the opposite sex.

tags.name: Animals
tags.description: Prominently features animal characters in a leading role.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Revenge
tags.description: Prominently features a character who aims to exact punishment in a resentful or vindictive manner.

title.native: B-PROJECT 妄想＊スキャンダル

node.description:
__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/chiyomaru5pb)__ | __[Company Profile (MAGES)](http://mages.co.jp/about/company/)__

__Chiyomaru Shikura__ is a Japanese guitarist, novelist, voice actor, radio personality, moderator, animation planner, animation supervisor, music producer, composer, arranger and the representative director of 5pb./MAGES. 

Chiyomaru resigns as chairman and representative director of MAGES. on January 4th, 2023.

He has been the producer and lead animation planner for titles such as Chaos;Head, Steins;Gate, and Robotics;Notes. Shikura is also a very active composer and lyricist. To date, he has written over a hundred theme songs for the video games and anime adaptations he's worked on.

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/chiyomaru5pb)__ | __[Company Profile (MAGES)](http://mages.co.jp/about/company/)__

__Chiyomaru Shikura__ is a Japanese guitarist, novelist, voice actor, radio personality, moderator, animation planner, animation supervisor, music producer, composer, arranger and the representative director of 5pb./MAGES. 

Chiyomaru resigns as chairman and representative director of MAGES. on January 4th, 2023.

He has been the producer and lead animation planner for titles such as Chaos;Head, Steins;Gate, and Robotics;Notes. Shikura is also a very active composer and lyricist. To date, he has written over a hundred theme songs for the video games and anime adaptations he's worked on.

[Website](http://hitodama.info/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/hitodama1103/)

A Japanese singer, songwriter, radio personality and scriptwriter.

She has released 17 singles and 11 albums since her debut as a 13-year-old in 1994. Several of her songs have been used as anime theme songs. She is often mistaken for a voice actress because she is in the same field of activity as idol-esque voice actresses. When she is working as a screenwriter, she goes by the name Deko Akao, an alias made up from her senior [Satoru Akahori](https://anilist.co/staff/97460/)'s name.

Mother of a son and twin daughters.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/waka_fuumi)

A regular presence in the [Precure](https://anilist.co/anime/603/) franchise since its beginning.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/waka_fuumi)

A regular presence in the [Precure](https://anilist.co/anime/603/) franchise since its beginning.
Masato Nakayama is a composer and former member of the music production group Elements Garden.

__[Website](http://www.tm-revolution.com) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/TMR15) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/takanori9nishikawa/) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/tmrevolutionofficial)__

Takanori Nishikawa is a Japanese voice actor, vocalist, lyricist, composer and arranger, who made his debut in the name of T.M.Revolution (T.M.R.) in May 1996, with a single “Dokusai –monopolize-”. Since then, he has established a reputation as a singer with ear-catching tunes, intriguing, irresistible and perfect stage setting and live performances. Many singles have been picked up for theme of major animations and games including “Mobile Suit Gundam”, and “Sengoku BASARA”. Since debut, T.M.R. has built global fan base and reputation mainly among Japanimation fans. He has performed at major anime conventions in the US, such as OTAKON 2003 (@ Baltimore, MD, August 2003), Pacific Media Expo (@ Anaheim, CA and other cities, May 2004) and the local audience were dazzled by his dynamic performance. 

These activities led to his release of albums worldwide. T.M.R. launched his 10th anniversary project in 2005. He released single “vestige” in August 2005 charting No.1 on Oricon chart (Japanese version of Billboard) and released a self-cover album “UNDER:COVER” (all songs are requested by fans) in January 2006. In June, he released a CD and a DVD, both entitled “1000000000000”(pronounced billion) featuring all singles and music videos he had released until then and ranked NO.1 on Oricon chart. Also, T.M.R. went back to the US by appearing on stage for New York Comic Convention, the largest pop culture convention on April 19th 2008 in NYC. On September 19th 2012, T.M.R. released DVD and Blu-ray disc “T.M.R. LIVE REVOLUTION '12 -15th Anniversary FINAL-” which contains footage of 15th anniversary tour final at Daiichi-Taiikukan, National Yoyogi Stadium in Tokyo. On September 2012, he organized a huge open-air rock festival “Inazuma Rock Festival” for the fourth time in his birth place Shiga prefecture. He will be participating “Anime Festival Asia 2012” in Singapore in November. He’s currently expanding his field as an actor, voice actor, and host for a media program.

(Source: tm-revolution.com)

__Non-anime roles:__
- Arataki Itto - Genshin Impact (VG)

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/chiyomaru5pb)__ | __[Company Profile (MAGES)](http://mages.co.jp/about/company/)__

__Chiyomaru Shikura__ is a Japanese guitarist, novelist, voice actor, radio personality, moderator, animation planner, animation supervisor, music producer, composer, arranger and the representative director of 5pb./MAGES. 

Chiyomaru resigns as chairman and representative director of MAGES. on January 4th, 2023.

He has been the producer and lead animation planner for titles such as Chaos;Head, Steins;Gate, and Robotics;Notes. Shikura is also a very active composer and lyricist. To date, he has written over a hundred theme songs for the video games and anime adaptations he's worked on.
Representative director of [Aniplex](https://anilist.co/studio/17/). Board Director at [CloverWorks](https://anilist.co/studio/6222/CloverWorks).
**Masayuki Nishide** is a Japanese producer and animation planner, who works for the Asahi Broadcasting Corporation (ABC).
**Hiroyasu Oyama** is a Japanese producer and animation planner.
